pr_title: iOS - Share PDFs and HTML content as PDFs with other supported Apps.

timeline.message:
- Share PDFs and HTML content as PDFs with other supported Apps.
- Remove unused code.

timeline.bodyText:
can these rules be generalized?
same with the previous rules, they should not be written in a way that only applies to a single user.
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText:
Any changes related to any specific user data will not be included while pushing the code by adding these directories here.
Earlier I have ignored user-specific files, now I have included the whole directory so that the user data not pushed by anyone.
replies.author: tushar-boston

timeline.bodyText: isn't HPHC/HPHC/QA.xcconfig being excluded via gitignore?

replies.bodyText:
This project.pbxproj will automatically update when you build without QA.xcconfig file.
There'll be no issues in building the project.

timeline.bodyText: what happens if fileTitle is empty? does it even work in that case?
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: It'll still share the PDF, but no title will be shown on the share screen.
